document_name: Enhansing service provision to VG in Health and Social_DaO pro_doc dec2010_F.docx
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/MNE/00060973/Enhansing service provision to VG in Health and Social_DaO pro_doc dec2010_F.docx

outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to improve service provision and deliver new services to vulnerable groups namely to the residents currently living in Konik area, the largest suburb of Podgorica, in a comprehensive, sustained, and sustainable manner. Enhancing the quality of health care and other social security services (related to fighting against poverty, unemployment and other severe challenges) provided to vulnerable population currently living Konik area. 
Main activity would be to conduct a research study on durable solutions for Konik residents, in the areas that represent the key challenges for this suburb, which are poverty, unemployment, security, infrastructures, public services, respect for basic and human rights. The study should provide recommendations for the Government and the other donors (EC) how to tackle the identified challenges.The project will also support issuance of personal documentation for displaced as a key precondition for accessing the social security services provided by the State.

project_descr: Enhancing Service Provision to Vulnerable Population in Health , Social Sector and other related sectors
project_title: Enhancing Service Provision to Vulnerable Population
